oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Larry Gatlin interview - Joe Suglia
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Recording of an interview with Larry Gatlin (performer), conducted by Joe Suglia.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Joe Suglia introduces Larry Gatlin -- Larry Gatlin talks about loving his fans so much that he has to keep them at a distance -- Gatlin talks about having 5,000 fans being different from having 250 fans -- Gatlin talks about fans who ask for too much from him -- Gatlin talks about changing from Monument Records to Columbia Records -- Gatlin talks about his new single and album, Straight Ahead -- Gatlin talks about all his traveling -- Gatlin talks about how fans should focus on his music rather than himself -- Gatlin talks about his groups name, the Gatlin Brothers Band -- Gatlin talks about an upcoming show -- Joe Suglia concludes the interview
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Gatlin, Larry, 1948-;
